医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
确定预测癌症患者免疫治疗反应的五个关键因素近年来，免疫疗法通过使免疫系统能够攻击肿瘤细胞而改变了癌症治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Five-key-factors-identified-for-predicting-immunotherapy-response-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Five-key-factors-identified-for-predicting-immunotherapy-response-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f68ba64d-cff4-47a1-8421-e0ce71f5c934 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 12:15:31 -0400 Five key factors identified for predicting immunotherapy response in cancer patients
QB3 领导的团队获得 1200 万美元资助，用先进模型探索自闭症起源由 QB3 领导的团队联合了加州大学伯克利分校、旧金山分校和圣克鲁斯分校的研究人员，获得了加州再生医学研究所 (CIRM) 的 1200 万美元拨款，用于使用名为“神经类器官。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/QB3-led-team-awarded-2412-million-to-explore-autism-origins-with-advanced-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/QB3-led-team-awarded-2412-million-to-explore-autism-origins-with-advanced-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ee5f3a0-c62c-488f-8d03-ae3bc57b91ab Thu, 12 Sep 2024 12:08:12 -0400 QB3-led team awarded $12 million to explore autism origins with advanced models
NCCN 通过西班牙语翻译和更多语言扩展了癌症指南库国家综合癌症网络、领先癌症中心联盟和 NCCN 基金会自豪地宣布计划将 NCCN 患者指南图书馆中的每本书都提供西班牙语版本；还提供其他语言的精选版本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/NCCN-expands-cancer-guidelines-library-with-Spanish-translations-and-more-languages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/NCCN-expands-cancer-guidelines-library-with-Spanish-translations-and-more-languages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91bfda8c-6fa2-4afe-9951-d5256714eea3 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 12:04:01 -0400 NCCN expands cancer guidelines library with Spanish translations and more languages
镰状细胞特征增加了不同血统的血栓风险美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员和合作者发现，作为镰状细胞病（即具有镰状细胞特征）的携带者，会增加出现血栓的风险，这种风险在传统上可能不存在的不同人群中是相同的。与镰状细胞病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Sickle-cell-trait-increases-risk-of-blood-clots-across-diverse-ancestries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Sickle-cell-trait-increases-risk-of-blood-clots-across-diverse-ancestries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0088ae9e-9688-437d-ae32-788dd1b2539c Thu, 12 Sep 2024 11:58:08 -0400 Sickle cell trait increases risk of blood clots across diverse ancestries
研究揭示重复使用抗生素如何损害肠道粘液屏障于默奥大学和塔尔图大学的研究人员发现，由于抗生素驱动的微生物群变化，重复使用抗生素的历史会导致肠道正常保护性粘液屏障出现缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Studies-reveal-how-repeated-antibiotic-use-damages-gut-mucus-barrier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Studies-reveal-how-repeated-antibiotic-use-damages-gut-mucus-barrier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a3aa798-474e-43ca-836d-cdcce2ecd135 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 11:50:00 -0400 Studies reveal how repeated antibiotic use damages gut mucus barrier
养宠物并没有改善 COVID-19 大流行期间的心理健康症状研究人员评估了 COVID-19 大流行期间饲养宠物与心理健康结果之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Pet-ownership-did-not-improve-mental-health-symptoms-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Pet-ownership-did-not-improve-mental-health-symptoms-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10506a41-f58c-4518-afbe-e542fa00b539 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 08:53:00 -0400 Pet ownership did not improve mental health symptoms during COVID-19 pandemic
达菲缺失表型可能导致癌症药物试验被不公平地排除达纳法伯癌症研究所和伦敦玛丽女王大学的研究人员在一份报告中报告说，许多新抗癌药物的临床试验可能不适当地排除了一些具有“达菲无效表型”的人，这种特征主要存在于非洲或中东血统的人中。新的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Duffy-null-phenotype-may-lead-to-unfair-exclusion-from-cancer-drug-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Duffy-null-phenotype-may-lead-to-unfair-exclusion-from-cancer-drug-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7858a331-5016-404b-ba8d-7455ac2ab6bf Thu, 12 Sep 2024 07:52:17 -0400 Duffy-null phenotype may lead to unfair exclusion from cancer drug trials
人工智能工具通过转换标准组织图像来增强癌症诊断VirtualMultiplexer 将组织学图像转化为详细的癌症标记物，通过人工智能创新简化诊断并提高患者治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/AI-tool-enhances-cancer-diagnosis-by-transforming-standard-tissue-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/AI-tool-enhances-cancer-diagnosis-by-transforming-standard-tissue-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=138994c0-50eb-4c8f-ac91-37a8bd639a98 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 07:09:00 -0400 AI tool enhances cancer diagnosis by transforming standard tissue images
更短的白细胞端粒长度和更大的 LTL 损耗与囊性纤维化的严重程度相关2024年8月29日，一篇新的研究论文发表在Aging（被MEDLINE/PubMed列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和Web of Science的“Aging-US”）第16卷第16期，题为“白细胞端粒”长度和磨损与囊性纤维化患者的疾病严重程度相关。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Shorter-leukcyto-telomere-length-and-greater-LTL-attrition-tied-to-cystic-fibrosis-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Shorter-leukcyto-telomere-length-and-greater-LTL-attrition-tied-to-cystic-fibrosis-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9b66d01-1885-4096-9815-69a69b12de9c Thu, 12 Sep 2024 07:08:03 -0400 Shorter leukocyte telomere length and greater LTL attrition tied to cystic fibrosis severity
新的 IndiPHARM 计划旨在彻底改变个性化药物管理哥伦比亚大学领导的一项名为 IndiPHARM 的多中心研究工作：用于药物优化的个体代谢组和暴露组评估将开发一个平台和监测系统，以防止药物与其他环境、遗传和生活方式因素之间不必要的相互作用，从而优化治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-IndiPHARM-initiative-aims-to-revolutionize-personalized-medication-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-IndiPHARM-initiative-aims-to-revolutionize-personalized-medication-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c89c7a05-00aa-4e5b-afcc-daff39ebcf67 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 07:02:46 -0400 New IndiPHARM initiative aims to revolutionize personalized medication management
